title: linux.md
summary: This document provides instructions for setting up and configuring a full Ergo node on Linux systems. It offers two options: using the ergo-installer.sh script to install the latest Ergo node, or following a step-by-step manual setup process detailed in a separate tutorial document. The document does not cover mining, and focuses solely on the installation and configuration of the Ergo node.

qa_pairs.question: What is the purpose of the ergo-installer.sh script?
qa_pairs.answer: The ergo-installer.sh script is used to install and run a full Ergo node on Linux systems.

qa_pairs.question: How can you run the ergo-installer.sh script?
qa_pairs.answer: You can run the ergo-installer.sh script by executing the following command: curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ergoplatform/ergo/master/ergo-installer.sh | sh -s -- --api-key=<YOUR_API_KEY>

qa_pairs.question: What is the alternative to using the ergo-installer.sh script?
qa_pairs.answer: The alternative to using the ergo-installer.sh script is to follow a step-by-step manual setup process, which is described in the tutorial.md file.

qa_pairs.question: Does the ergo-installer.sh script cover the setup for mining?
qa_pairs.answer: No, the ergo-installer.sh script does not cover the setup for mining. It only explains how to install and run a full Ergo node.

qa_pairs.question: What is the main purpose of setting up a full Ergo node?
qa_pairs.answer: The main purpose of setting up a full Ergo node is to participate in the Ergo network and have a local copy of the blockchain.

sections.heading: How to set up and configure a full Ergo node
sections.content:
This page explains how to install and run a full Ergo node. It does not cover mining. 

Linux Systems can run [ergo-installer.sh](https://github.com/ergoplatform/ergo/blob/master/ergo-installer.sh)

```bash
curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ergoplatform/ergo/master/ergo-installer.sh | sh -s -- --api-key=<YOUR_API_KEY>
```

With this script you'll have the latest Ergo node installed without any hassle.

If you'd prefer to get set up manually, here's a [step-by-step.](tutorial.md)
